channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DeSantis Says He Is Undeterred by Order Shutting Down Florida’s ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
item.description: A federal judge had ordered that much of the Florida immigration detention center be dismantled, a ruling Gov. Ron DeSantis called “preordained.”

item.title: Trump’s Revenge Campaign, Live on Morning TV
item.description: The recent F.B.I. raid on John Bolton’s home makes clear that President Trump is perverting the justice system to intimidate his critics.

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia released from federal custody pending criminal trial
item.description: The case of Abrego Garcia, a Maryland man originally from El Salvador, raised basic questions of due process in Trump's crackdown on undocumented immi...

item.title: See how new voting maps in Texas and California would shift the political landscape
item.description: The major parties' redistricting battle escalated this week, with lawmakers in the country's two most populous states each taking a notable step towar...

item.title: Canada removes some of its retaliatory tariffs on the U.S.
item.description: Canada is dropping retaliatory tariffs to match U.S. tariff exemptions for goods covered under the United States-Mexico-Canada trade pact, Prime Minis...

item.title: Multiple Dead After Tour Bus Crashes in Western New York
item.description: At least one child was among those killed when a tour bus crashed about 30 miles east of Buffalo, officials said. Part of the New York State Thruway w...

item.title: Hegseth Authorizes National Guard Troops in D.C. to Carry Weapons
item.description: It remains unclear whether the National Guard soldiers will be armed as they walk through the city.

item.title: The EV tax credit ends soon — but there's a little bit of wiggle room for car buyers
item.description: A federal EV tax credit worth up to $7,500 ends Sept. 30. But the IRS has just clarified that shoppers don't need to actually have the keys in hand by...

item.title: Move Over, Mouse Ears: For Disney Adults, There’s a New Obsession
item.description: Tiny stuffed animals that use magnets to stay perched on your shoulder have become a must-have accessory for some theme park superfans.

item.title: Justice Department releases transcripts from its conversations with Ghislaine Maxwell
item.description: Maxwell, the longtime partner of convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, spoke with top Justice Department officials over the course of two days in la...

item.title: Scientists Split Giraffes Into Four Species. Three Are In Trouble.
item.description: A reassessment of the iconic species has “some dramatic implications for how we view giraffe conservation across Africa,” a new study concludes.

item.title: Global Monitors Confirm Famine in Part of Gaza. What Does That Mean?
item.description: A panel of food security experts said the famine could spread to more of the enclave within weeks.

item.title: Thaksin Shinawatra, Former Thai Premier, Cleared of Insulting Monarchy
item.description: But the reprieve for Thaksin Shinawatra, who remains a political force, did not mean that the legal troubles for him and his family were over.

item.title: Tiébilé Dramé, Voice for Rights in Mali, Is Dead at 70
